name: Big trouble in little Burgertown
description:
I originally wanted to make this game for a game jam that had the theme pickles. Sadly life happened and I ran out of time. Try it and please critique the parts that are in the game. I really appreciate feedback! Thanks. 

The game can be played with keyboard or keyboard & mouse and even a gamepad. You can play with any controller but the button layout assumes you have an xbox controller.
